events.message: Applicant has formally submitted the personal loan application for covering upcoming medical expenses.
Loan application has been reviewed and categorised under Personal Loan based on the stated purpose and documentation.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to assist the applicant through the personal loan approval process.
The submitted application is undergoing the initial review stage to verify completeness and eligibility criteria.
Additional documents such as proof of income and medical bills have been requested to support the loan application.
Applicant has promptly submitted all requested documents including detailed medical expense receipts and income verification.
The credit report for the applicant has been obtained and reviewed as part of the risk and repayment capability assessment.
Risk evaluation incorporating credit score and debt-to-income ratio has been conducted to measure default risk.
Loan terms including interest rate, repayment schedule, and principal amount have been formally presented to the applicant.
Applicant has provided feedback regarding the loan offer and requested clarification on some repayment options.
The application has been escalated to senior management due to applicant's request for a customized repayment plan.
The personal loan application has been approved by the credit committee following the fulfillment of all requirements.
Loan amount has been successfully disbursed to the applicant's designated bank account as per the agreed terms.
Loan officer reached out to the applicant to ensure understanding of repayment obligations and answer any questions.
The personal loan file has been officially closed following successful fund disbursement and post-approval verifications.
